episodes.title: Amway Pyramid Scheme: ED Chargesheets Amway India; Alleges Money Laundering, Cheating | MLM
episodes.description:
#amway #pyramidscheme #PMLA #moneylaundering #ED #EDcase #multilevelmarketing 

The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has filed a chargesheet against the direct marketing firm Amway India. The agency claimed that the company generated Rs 4,050 crore by cheating its subscribers. It also said that Amway siphoned off ₹2,859 crores overseas.

Amway started the craze of multi-level marketing in India by enrolling innumerable people under its schemes. The company offered people lucrative commissions on its products while they kept adding members below them in the pyramid. ..............................................................................................
